Title: Establishes a duty to inform certain patients about the risks associated with cesarean section for patients undergoing a primary cesarean section
Summary: Establishes a duty to inform certain patients about the risks associated with cesarean section for patients undergoing a primary cesarean section; establishes a duty to inform certain patients about the reason for performing a primary cesarean section delivery.
LawCode: Add ยง2500-n, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the duty to inform certain patients about the risks associated with cesarean section for patients undergoing a primary cesarean section and to inform certain patients about the reason for performing primary cesarean section delivery
